name: Monstrous City
description:
A fun little 2D platformer, where you have to beat monsters and escape from a city full of them. This project was really fun to make and if you enjoy it, make sure to donate or leave a 5-STAR rating!

Game music: BY FOREVER

A game was made by: Daniel Jankovskij @JannyGames

Make sure to follow us on social media not to miss out on our FIRST EVER commercial release!

Twitter: @JannyGames

Facebook: @JannyGamesStudio

Instagram: @_janny_games_

Email: jannygamesstudio@gmail.com

P.S. There are a total of 2 easter eggs in the game, HAVE FUN! :)
